name: Battle Engineer
description:
You are a battle engineer that feels the need to mash weapons and other random items together for the sake of making them "better". Both the weapon and item trigger whenever you shoot ( at the same time ).

Survive the waves of baddies with your improvised arsenal!

Use WASD to move and LeftClick to shoot!

Fullscreen is recommened.
